description: Lychees and chilli make this light salad sweet and spicy.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spicy Lychee Salad with Crispy Shallots Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium shallot, peeled and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the lychees, reserving 2 tablespoons of syrup and chop into halves.
Whisk the lychee syrup, half of the sesame oil, rice wine vinegar and half of the chilli together to make a dressing.
Heat the rest of the sesame oil in a large pan on medium heat and fry the shallots for 4-5 minutes until crispy.
Place the rocket, radishes, carrots and lychees in a large bowl, pour over the dressing and toss well to coat. Serve with crispy shallots and extra chilli on top.
